explanations of the why's and
wherefores of the web of con-
sumer ignorance in our country
was presented la st week in Wa sh-
ington.


A committee of federal inves-
tigators heard and read many
words in defense of the willy man
nerisms of our manufa cturers
and producers of more than a
thousand ranging from
detergents to canned beans.


The little woman who shops for
the family S groceriesisa victim
of untruthful advertising. One did
not need a federal committee to
figure this out. Anyone who eats,
sleeps, sits, shaves, reads or just
thinks is a victim of advertising
in some form or another.


The good guys and the bad guys
fight for our souls from the diaper
to the shroud. Evil and goodness
have a timeless campaign within
our souls or minds.


The backgrounds ofthe recent
truth In advertising investigation
are the shelves Of the supermar-
kets or neighborhood groceries.
The claims of manufa cturers and
packagers are being assaulted.


n-women-women are the
targets of those writer's and pr1n-
tiers of the small. fine print which
explains the weight and contents
of a particular package.


am amazed at the gullibility
of the housewife, single girl or
old maid who constantly buys the
largest package or box without
checking the ounce and pound no
tice.


Last week took several min
utes more during my weekly
shopping to study the ounce and
pound listings. You would be
astounded to know that giant sizes
range from a bar of soap to a
large ham. We are at the mercy
of the conniving package (sleight
of ounce artist). He creates a
larger appearing glass or box
container and fills it with less
we are lulled into buying the big
bargain and we get the smaller
amount.


There should be some further
searching for truth in advertis-
ing. Not only are the packa ging
methods against the defenseles
shopper--but all manners Of half
truths and innuendoes await us in
the drug store, at the meat
counter and at the cosmetic bar.


Truth in advertising should not
be shrugged off as another intru-
sion of federal action in a private
matter. We are being made will
ing victims of more schemes than
any arch criminal ever devised.


Great lands can't women (who
hold the purse strings) see that
one man S large size is another
man. S medium


Who ever heard of your deter
gent getting clothes whittier than
new When did that white knight
ever clean your dirty linen7 How
is your home so dusty when all
one needs is Mr.. Clean around7


Does your hair need holding
spray7 Have your teeth been ad-
mired lately7 Did you bring along
an Aka Seltzer7 Does your hus-
band like your hair gray7 Have
you used the latest deodorant7


What--why--how can you live
without waking up bringht and
fresh with Nytol7


| would like to put in plea for
the harried consumer--how can
they spend so much time search
ing for truth in advertising? Don't
they under stand--we wouldn't
recognize the truthful it came
